body_html: @drpngx After reading the thread, I guess the right fix is to add something similar to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_python.cmake#L627-L663 for memory_stats. However, I don't have a Windows machine, so I won't be able to verify my fix. Any ideas?
